data.title: Leicester Village climate: Average Temperature by month, Leicester Village water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Leicester Village

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Leicester Village

>>average temperature by month Leicester Village

>>Weather Leicester Village

>>Water temperature Leicester Village

Leicester Village's climate is classified as tropical. Throughout the majority of months within a given year, Leicester Village experiences noteworthy precipitation levels. However, there exists only a brief period characterized by aridity. Köppen and Geiger classify this climate as Am. The mean temperature prevailing in the city of Leicester Village is recorded as 26.0 °C | 78.7 °F, according to statistical data. The rainfall here is around 2946 mm | 116.0 inch per year.

Due to its proximity to the equator, it is quite challenging to precisely delineate summers in Leicester Village. The period of January, February, May, October, November, December is widely regarded as the peak season for visitation.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Leicester Village

Precipitation is the lowest in February, with an average of 7 mm | 0.3 inch. The maximum quantity of rainfall is observed during the month of August, exhibiting an average value of 751 mm | 29.6 inch.

average temperature by month Leicester Village

At an average temperature of 26.9 °C | 80.4 °F, December is the hottest month of the year. During the month of August, there is a notable drop in temperature, with an average low of approximately 24.7 °C | 76.5 °F.

Between the driest and wettest months, the difference in precipitation is 744 mm | 29 inch. The degree of fluctuation in the yearly temperature is approximately 2.2 °C | 4.0 °F.

In terms of relative humidity, the month that exhibits the highest level is September with a percentage of 76.04. Conversely, January has been recorded as having the lowest amount of relative humidity at only 76.04. It is noteworthy that July has the highest number of rainy days, amounting to 28.53, whereas the month with the least rainfall is February, experiencing only 1.73 wet days.

Leicester Village weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Leicester Village

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

On average, the location of Leicester Village records the highest number of daily sunshine hours during February. The mean duration of sunlight per day in this month is approximately 9.82, with a total cumulative count reaching up to 304.48.

On average, Leicester Village records the lowest daily sunshine hours in January. During this period, there is an average of 5.79 hours of sunlight per day and a total accumulation of 179.5 hours.

Throughout the year, a total of 2856.35 hours of light are recorded in the location of Leicester Village. The monthly average for sunlight is approximately 94.05 hours.

The average annual water temperature of Atlantic Ocean in the city of Leicester Village is recorded to be approximately 27.70°C | 81.86°F.

When the water content reaches 28.80°C | 83.84°F, it is observed that during November of each year, there is a significant increase in the average monthly temperature. Conversely, around 26.70°C | 80.06°F, particularly in August, we observe an opposite trend where temperatures hit their lowest point.

At its highest, the water temperature reaches around 28.80°C | 83.84°F in the year on November 30. The lowest value is around 26.70°C | 80.06°F, which occurs on approximately August 02.

The body of water in closest proximity to Leicester Village is identified as the Atlantic Ocean.

Airport close to Leicester Village

The closest Airports of Leicester Village are: Lungi International Airport (FNA) 17.56km

You can reach Leicester Village from this Cities by Plane: London (LGW), Casablanca (CMN), Monrovia (ROB), Dakar (DKR), Accra (ACC), Lagos (LOS), Banjul (BJL), Abidjan (ABJ), Brussels (BRU)
